subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
Deaths (Fatalities)
Automobile Safety Features and Defects
lead_paragraph: When the Indianapolis 500 kicks off on Sunday, many will be watching the series for the first time since Dan Wheldon, last year’s champion, died in the 2011 season finale.
snippet: When the Indianapolis 500 kicks off on Sunday, many will be watching the series for the first time since Dan Wheldon, last year’s champion, died in the 2011 season finale.
